description: Implement `linearSearchAll(arr, target)` that returns an array of ALL indices where `target` occurs in `arr`. Return an empty array if not found.

easy: Line 3: for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {

Loop through entire array (don't stop at first match)
Push each matching index into the result array
